query-mapping.description: Queries used by the comments module

query.name: comment-list
query.comment: Get the list of comments associated with given database entity
query.sql: SELECT c.id, u.name, e.email, c.create_date, c.format, c.message, c.status FROM awa_comment AS c INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON c.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_email AS e ON u.email_id = e.id WHERE c.entity_type = :entity_type AND c.entity_id = :entity_id AND c.status = :status ORDER BY c.create_date :sort

query.name: all-comment-list
query.comment: Get the list of comments associated with given database entity
query.sql: SELECT c.id, u.name, e.email, c.create_date, c.format, c.message, c.status FROM awa_comment AS c INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON c.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_email AS e ON u.email_id = e.id WHERE c.entity_type = :entity_type AND c.entity_id = :entity_id ORDER BY c.create_date :sort
